about_the_game:
🚀 Get Ready for an Extreme Challenge: Tough, Frustrating, and Ridiculously Addictive.

Immerse yourself in a surreal universe where you become a hyper-realistic stone, torn from its original painting. Now you're trapped in a strange and illogical world, and there's only one way to escape: reach the top. Easy to understand, nearly impossible to achieve.

🪨 Unique Mechanics: Throw the stone with precision, but be careful... you can only launch it twice in a row before waiting for it to recharge. Can you stay calm while gravity and absurd level design conspire against you?

Key Features:

📌 Challenging platforms – Jump, roll, and slide through bizarre landscapes.
📌 Surreal obstacles – Face challenges that question logic while managing your own sanity.
📌 Guaranteed frustration – Experience the pain of falling into the abyss just when you thought you had made it.

🎯 Are you ready to test your limits?
Prepare to fall. And fall again. Because here, every throw matters, and every mistake is felt.

🔔 Warning: Only recommended for players with nerves of steel.

Prove that even a simple stone can reach the stars. 🌌

movies.name: The Hyperreal Rock in a Surreal World

name: The Hyperreal Rock in a Surreal World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (or newer)
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You are a hyperrealistic rock trapped in a surreal world. You jump, roll… and fall. Over and over. 99% frustration, 1% satisfaction. Do you have nerves of steel? Find out as you try to escape this absurd chaos. Download now and suffer in style!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Arabic, Catalan
